climbs.name: Phurba:  fun in the sun route
climbs.fa: Paul Bucher, Talor Bond, Drake and Leroy

content.description: fairly sustained 5.10 climbing or A0. nice little tower, close to town and campground. seems like it should have been climbed before this. there was some evidence of activity low down but  nothing up higher or on top. no anchors, carne or rope groves.  please weigh in if you have info on this one.
content.location: the tower is obvious from the road and campground. start in the notch just above the arch and climb up that side of the tower. bomber anchors on top.

content.description:
Any guide in Moab who climbs has looked at this beautiful clean corner more then once. I've seen it 50+ times.

Start Wide Hands for 50' then tapers to tips over next 55'
content.protection:
Standard Desert Rack. extra #3, nothing smaller then yellow alien.

Rap ring
content.location: In the canyon..It can be an adventure to get there, if you don't know the way
